anya-e0105n11:1_0: Ayaṁ pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāsanamalabhūtānaṁ adhammavādānaṁ uppatti.
anya-e0105n11:1_1: Asokarañño hi kāle uppabbājetvā nikkaḍḍhitā aññatitthiyā buddhasāsane aladdhapatiṭṭhā kodhābhibhūtā pāṭaliputtato
anya-e0105n11:1_2: nikkhamitvā rājagahasamīpe nālandāyaṁ sannipatitvā evaṁ sammantayiṁsu “mahājanassa buddhasāsane anavagāhatthāya
anya-e0105n11:1_4: tañca kho tesaṁ samayaṁ ajānantehi na sakkā kātuṁ,
anya-e0105n11:1_5: tasmā yena kenaci upāyena punapi tattha pabbajitabbamevā”ti.
anya-e0105n11:1_6: Te evaṁ sammantayitvā puna āgantvā visuddhattheravādīnamantaraṁ pavisituṁ asakkontā tadaññesaṁ sattarasannaṁ
anya-e0105n11:1_7: mahāsaṅghikādinikāyānaṁ santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā attano aññatitthiyabhāvaṁ ajānāpetvā pabbajitvā piṭakattayamuggaṇhitvā
anya-e0105n11:1_8: tañca viparivattetvā tato kosambiṁ gantvā dhammavinayanāsanāya upāyaṁ mantayitvā 253-buddhavasse chasu
anya-e0105n11:1_9: ṭhānesu vasantā (1) hemavatiko (2) rājagiriko (3) siddhatthiko (4) pubbaseliyo (5) aparaseliyo (6) vājiriyo
anya-e0105n11:1_10: (7) vetullo (8) andhako (9) aññamahāsaṅghikoti nava abhinave nikāye uppādesuṁ nikāyasaṅgahe 9-piṭṭhe.
anya-e0105n11:1_11: Tesaṁ nāmāni ca laddhiyo ca kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ āgatāyeva.
anya-e0105n11:8_0: Vajirapabbatavāsino vājiriyā (6) gūḷhavinayaṁ nāma ganthaṁ akaṁsu.
anya-e0105n11:9_0: Teyeva sabbe māyājālatanta-samājatantādike aneke tantaganthe ca,
anya-e0105n11:13_3: aññāni pana vaṇṇapiṭakādīni jambudīpeyeva nivattantīti nikāyasaṅgahe vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n11:14_3: tathā hi vuttaṁ asaṅgena nāma ācariyena abhidhammasamuccaye nāma mahāyānikagante (79-piṭṭhe) “vepullaṁ katamaṁ?
anya-e0105n11:14_14: upamānadhammānaṁ tulanābhāvato”ti pana abuddhavacanāniyevāti vutta”nti ca.
anya-e0105n11:16_0: “Gūḷhavinayaṁ gūḷhavessantaraṁ gūḷhamahosadhaṁ vaṇṇapiṭakaṁ aṅgulimālapiṭakaṁ raṭṭhapālagajjitaṁ āḷavakagajjitaṁ
anya-e0105n11:17_2: tesañca atthaṁ ajānitvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyehi tāni paṭikkhipituṁ sakkā,
anya-e0105n11:17_3: nāpi taṁ paṭikkhepavacanaṁ jambudīpikaṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ vacanaṁ bhavituṁ,
anya-e0105n11:17_5: Tasmā tāni ca tadaññāni ca mahāyānikapiṭakāni taṁkālikāni yebhuyyena sīhaḷadīpamupāgatānīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0105n11:17_6: Tesu ca vajjiputtakagaṇapariyāpannassa dhammarucinikāyassa piṭakānaṁ tadupāgamanaṁ pubbeva vuttaṁ.
